item.title: azure: [In preview] Public Preview: Azure NetApp Files cache volumes
item.description:
Azure NetApp Files cache volumes are now available in public preview. The feature, built on NetAppâ€™s ONTAP FlexCache technology, provides a persistent, high-performance cache in Azure for data stored on ONTAP-based storage.

  • Source: Azure Updates
